summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the installation of a retaining wall along Halleck Avenue Southwest between Bonair Drive Southwest and a point approximately 53 feet southwest of the intersection of Halleck Avenue Southwest with Southwest College Street, all as a part of the Halleck Avenue Southwest Retaining Wall Project; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, including property and property rights necessary for subsurface tie-back anchors on certain adjacent properties and providing for payment from the Engineering Operating Fund and Seattle General Street Improvement Bonds, 1986 Fund (60SB) or from other general funds as may be provided by law.
